arcade.env.comp

Class SourceSites.SourceSite

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.env.comp.Site

    class SourceSites.SourceSite
extends Site
    Extension of Site for SourceSites.

    Adds a field for source concentration.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SourceSite

        private SourceSite(int code,
                   double[][][] delta,
                   double[][][] current,
                   double[][][] previous,
                   double conc)
        Creates a SourceSite for the given molecule.
        Parameters:
        code - the molecule code
        delta - the array holding change in concentration
        current - the array holding current concentrations for current tick
        previous - the array holding previous concentrations for previous tick
        conc - the source concentration of the molecule
